value.name: Marvin Veiga, Suspect In 2020 Brockton Shooting, Killed By Police In Tennessee
value.description: BOSTON (CBS) – Marvin Veiga, who was added to the Massachusetts Most Wanted list last month in connection with a Brockton shooting, was shot and killed by police in Tennessee on Saturday.

value.name: Man whose mom said threatened violence killed after standoff with police
value.description: Police shot Marvin Veiga, 32, late in the evening of April 23 after Veiga charged at officers with two knives after a traffic stop. Veiga was wanted in Massachusetts on a outstanding murder warrant.
